title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 340.2 - Investigation of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 340.2 - Investigation of application

State Regulations

Upon the filing of such application the Podiatry Practice

Committee shall investigate and pass upon the same within 60 days of such
filing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
340.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
